Title: addTupleOfIntervals
Description: Consecutively adds a tuple of intervals to a Date or a DateTime.
date: First interval or interval of tuples. date/date32/datetime/datetime64.intervals: Tuple of intervals to add to date. tuple(interval).
Returns date with added intervals. date/date32/datetime/datetime64.
Examples: WITH toDate('2018-01-01') AS dateSELECT addTupleOfIntervals(date, (INTERVAL 1 DAY, INTERVAL 1 MONTH, INTERVAL 1 YEAR))
